channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Custom User CSS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Custom User CSS

item.title: CVE-2023-6391|2024-08-02T08:28:21.838Z -- unknown -- custom%20user%20css
item.description: The Custom User CSS WordPress plugin through 0.2 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack.
